text: Derek Saunders (6 January 1928 - 3 March 2018) was an English footballer. He played for Chelsea during the 1950s. Saunders was a member of Chelsea's 1954-55 Championship-winning team. He was one of only two players to play in every game that season. Saunders died on 3 March 2018 at the age of 90. ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile of Derek Saunders Category:1928 births Category:2018 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Sportspeople from Hertfordshire
title: Derek Saunders
